org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: AVEVAI, Aurora Labs, Blue Current, BYTON, YinLong Group, and Hozon are part of the electric vehicle and battery technology sector. Aurora Labs and BYTON focus on developing advanced software and technology for electric vehicles, while Blue Current and YinLong Group specialize in manufacturing advanced solid-state batteries and lithium batteries for electric vehicles. Hozon is an electric vehicle startup that uses technology to develop intelligent electric vehicle models.

overview_description.description:
AVEVAI - AV.EV.AI | INNOVATE, CREATE & LEAD | 2020 SG SME100 'Fastest Growing Startup' Award winner

AVEVAI is a B2B company with team members from the automotive, aviation, distribution & logistics industries. Our core business is to manufacture AVEVAI brand commercial EV with our innovative technology that addresses the market requirements & challenges of urban logistics of the future. SMEs around the world with the surge in e-commerce are in need of CEVs with lower TCO, connected & energy-efficient vehicles, which is why AVEVAI stays ahead of the competition & offers exactly what the market wants. 

AVEVAI is also establishing consumer trading & retail business in profitable markets using its industry-experienced team to expand & build its regional network. We develop & source the right products to fit our region & establish long-term relationships with our customers. Investing in the AVEVAI brand & in our partner’s brand is the commitment to grow together in the region we represent.

The key to our successful and scalable business is to have an innovative business model, adaptability in an ever-changing competitive industry, a team & partners who are industry leaders

about_short_description.short_description: AVEVAI means Autonomous Vehicle, Electric Vehicle and Artificial Intelligence | Efficient Electric Commercial Vehicles | Battery Technology

product.name: IONA Classic
product.description: An electric motorcycle designed for city driving and last-mile deliveries, featuring a 4000W electric rear hub motor and a driving range of up to 120 km.

product.name: IONA S
product.description: A compact electric van designed for optimal comfort and practicality, suitable for everyday use with a steel frame chassis for stability and safety.

product.name: IONA XS
product.description: A compact electric truck offering versatility and practicality for daily operations, with options for different battery packs and cargo configurations.

product.name: IONA Y
product.description: A maxi scooter powered by electricity, designed for eco-friendly transportation with a sporty design, offering a driving range of 150 km and a max speed of 130 km/h.

product.name: IONA 3
product.description: An electric three-wheeler designed for efficient urban transport, details and specifications pending as the product is announced as coming soon.

product.name: A12
product.description: A fully electric bus designed for public transport with a low floor, two passenger doors, a driving range of 300 km, and a passenger capacity of 70.
